               </tei-publicationStmt>

                  <tei-title level="j" type="main" data-origname="title" data-origatts="type level">New York Tribune</tei-title>

               <tei-msIdentifier data-origname="msIdentifier">

                   <tei-idno type="URLImages" data-origname="idno" data-origatts="type">https://chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030214/1920-05-07/ed-1/seq-12</tei-idno>

        <tei-profileDesc data-origname="profileDesc">

    <tei-facsimile data-origname="facsimile">
        <tei-surface data-origname="surface">
            <tei-graphic url="sun-new-york-1920.png" data-origname="graphic" data-origatts="url" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="10,14 10,136 935,136 935,14" id="eSc_textblock_4f5aecd5" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="133,143 133,276 798,276 798,143" id="eSc_textblock_b669256d" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="762,294 758,374 694,388 616,388 616,423 521,423 521,572 467,572 467,574 177,574 177,604 178,604 178,605 58,605 49,321 68,283 70,282 764,282 764,292" id="eSc_textblock_cd8eef02" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="49,1001 49,742 61,718 58,612 459,612 459,1003 52,1003" id="eSc_textblock_6dcfb305" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="915,615 913,229 782,295 779,383 634,391 620,434 556,422 521,450 521,615" id="eSc_textblock_8162a045" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
        </tei-surface>
    </tei-facsimile>
    <tei-text data-origname="text">
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_4f5aecd5" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-orgName corresp="welte.studios" data-origname="orgName" data-origatts="corresp">The Welte-Mignon Studios</tei-orgName>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-address data-origname="address">
               667 Fifth Avenue-at 53rd Street
            </tei-address>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_b669256d" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>A really satisfactory way
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>to buy musical instruments</tei-div>
            <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_cd8eef02" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-hi rendition="#in" class="in" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">A</tei-hi> FEELING of utter confidence is engendered at the
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-orgName corresp="welte.studios" data-origname="orgName" data-origatts="corresp">Welte Mignon Studios</tei-orgName>. You
            instinctively know
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>that your continued patronage is sought and, therefore,
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>that
            everything will be made to bend toward
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>giving you thorough and complete
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>satisfaction.
            There is a wide range of
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>instruments from which to choose, at
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>prices and on
            terms thoroughly in
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>accord with your own idea of what is
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>equitable.</tei-div>
            <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_6dcfb305" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The Welte-Mignon
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Reproducing Piano
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The instrument chosen by
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/118986724" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Paderewski</tei-persName>,
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/124379923" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Lhe-<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>vinne</tei-persName>,
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/11918625X" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">
                <tei-sic data-origname="sic">Hofman</tei-sic>
            </tei-persName>,
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/118518011" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Busoni</tei-persName>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>and scores of others, to
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-seg ana="#immortality" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                preserve their genius for posterity.
            </tei-seg>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>You should hear <tei-persName corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/118986724" type="artist" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="type corresp">Paderewski's</tei-persName> reproductions;
            <tei-seg ana="#soulfulness" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                hear how
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>he has played
                his soul into indestructible records for the
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name>
            </tei-seg>.
            <tei-seg ana="#repeatability" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                Records which you may
                reproduce at any
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>time and as often as you like
            </tei-seg>, in your own home.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-num type="cardinal" subtype="artist-count" value="156" data-origname="num" data-origatts="value subtype type">
               One hundred and fifty-six
            </tei-num>
            musicians have recorded more
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>than
            <tei-num type="cardinal" subtype="work-count" value="5000" data-origname="num" data-origatts="value subtype type">
               five thousand
            </tei-num>
            selections for the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name>. Imagine
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>the delight to be derived from such a collection.
            <tei-seg ana="#affordability" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                And consider
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>that the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon Reproducing Piano</tei-name> is within
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>everyone's means, for it may be
                bought on your terms, with
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>in reason.
            </tei-seg>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Just drop in at the <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">Studios</tei-orgName> to hear the
            <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte</tei-name> play. Please
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>feel free to ask for your favorite selections. We consider the
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>pleasure
            entirely ours.
        </tei-div>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_8162a045" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs">
            <tei-seg ana="#sitting_woman" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                <tei-figure data-origname="figure">
                    <tei-desc resp="#np" data-origname="desc" data-origatts="resp">
                        Woman sitting in a chair in front of an
                        upright piano.
                    </tei-desc>
                </tei-figure>
                </tei-seg>
        </tei-div>

        <tei-gap reason="irrelevant" data-origname="gap" data-origatts="reason">
            <tei-desc resp="#np" data-origname="desc" data-origatts="resp">
                The ad also includes textes for "Pathe",
                "Pianos and Player-Pianos" and
                "Victor Victrolas and Victor Records" which
                have been omitted here.
            </tei-desc>
        </tei-gap>
    </tei-text>
</tei-TEI>
